roleset.name: start a fire
roleset.note: KINDLE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'kindle' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 45.4. (from kindle.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: not a literal fire
example.text: Canadian officials said the trade pact has kindled an export interest among many small Canadian companies that previously had little or no foreign sales.
example.arg: an export interest among many small Canadian companies that previously had little or no foreign sales
